table.name: civicrm_peer_campaign
table.comment: A collection of peer pages that share a common goal and setup process

field.name: target_entity_table
field.title: Target Entity Table
field.comment: The type of entity that this campaign's peer pages are trying to get people to interact with

field.name: target_entity_id
field.title: Target Entity ID
field.comment: The ID for the entity that this campaign's peer pages are trying to get people to interact with

field.name: total_function
field.title: Total Function
field.comment: The function used to aggregate peer fulfillment records to compute a total for each page associated with this campaign

field.name: supporter_profile_id
field.title: Supporter Profile
field.comment: FK to civicrm_uf_group.id to set the profile used when creating a new peer page

field.name: is_active
field.title: Enabled?
field.comment: Is Peer Campaign Page Block enabled/active?
